nodeList.description: Summon a decoy.
Decoy's final explosion deals more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers) and explodes in a larger area.

node.description: Summon a decoy.

nodeList.description: All explosions from Decoy deal more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers).

node.description: Decoy's final explosion deals more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers) and explodes in a larger area.
Summon a decoy.
Decoy has a chance to cause a small explosion when hit, up to a maximum of 2 explosions.

All explosions' base fire damage is converted to cold. Consequently this damage scales with increases to cold damage, but not increases to fire damage. Explosions also gain a base freeze rate.

Ignite chance from all sources is converted to chill chance and effects related to ignite now depend on chill instead.
Decoy's final explosion deals more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers) and explodes in a larger area.
Summon a decoy.
Decoy lasts longer, but has a longer cooldown.
Decoy reflects a percentage of damage to attackers.
Summon a decoy.

nodeList.description: Detonation costs less mana.

node.description:
Decoy becomes a combo ability. The first cast creates the decoy, and the second detonates it. The remote detonation costs mana.

Has no effect if Decoy has additional charges.
All explosions from Decoy deal more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers).
Decoy's final explosion deals more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers) and explodes in a larger area.

node.description: Summon a decoy.

nodeList.altText: {Haste} grants 30% increased movement speed. Does not stack.
nodeList.description: {Sonic Wave} grants {Haste} to allies hit for a duration.

node.altText:
Frailty causes enemies to deal 6% less damage per stack for 4 seconds (multiplicative with other modifiers). Stacking up to 3 times.

Armour Shred reduces armour by 100, lasts 4 seconds, and can stack.
node.description: The Decoy emits a {Sonic Wave} when it appears, inflicting {Frailty} and armor shred to nearby enemies.
Decoy costs less mana.
Summon a decoy.

nodeList.altText: Armour Shred reduces armour by 100, lasts 4 seconds, and can stack.
nodeList.description: {Sonic Wave} inflicts additional stacks of armor shred, and armor shred it applies lasts longer.
